description: A portLinkFault DetectStatusChanged trap is sent whenever the
value of lfdPairsLfdState changes. The two ports comprising
the LFD pair appear in the portNum and peerPortnumvarbinds. The portAdmin
varbind reports the current administrative state of the portNum port.

description: A portHeartbeatStatusChangedTrap is sent whenever the state of
the heartbeat pair changes. The two ports comprising
the HB pair appear in the portNum and peerPortnumvarbinds. The portAdmin
varbind reports the current administrative state of the portNum port. This trap and
the varbinds apply to any heartbeat pair type, even theough the varbinds are
named for monitor (tool) heartbeat pairs.

event.Summary: Heartbeat status for ports $v7 & $v8 changed to $v10

description: This trap is sent as a result of a file operation status change. Typically this
results from saving, loading or deleting files. Traps may be sent more than once
per operation, e.g. to signify the start and end of the action.

description: This trap is sent whenever the status of a SW image command changes. The
command may have been initiated by a user interface (CLI or webUI) or a remote
manager via SNMP or Net Conf. See NETOPTICS-XFAM-IMAGE-MIB for SNMP
objects which may be written to initiate commands.
